tool_description: An API showing the latest music charts
title: UK Official Charts

api_list.name: Get Movies Chart
api_list.description: This endpoint gives the UK movies chart
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://uk-official-charts.p.rapidapi.com/film-chart"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uk-official-charts.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Albums Chart
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the UK album chart.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://uk-official-charts.p.rapidapi.com/albums-chart"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uk-official-charts.p.rapidapi.com"
}

print(response.json())
